pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings: bekerja bersama (suami dan istri) mencari nafkah bersama

related.meaning: penghasilan ganda (suami dan istri sama-sama bekerja)

lessons.japanese: アメリカでは多くの夫婦が収支をあわせるため共稼ぎをしている。
lessons.indonesian: Many couples in America both work to make ends meet.

lessons.japanese: 今では多くの家庭が共稼ぎで、夫と妻の両方が働いている。
lessons.indonesian: Many families now have two breadwinners with both husbands and wives working.
